title: what’s in a (user)name?
text:
The maximum length of an Instagram username is 30 characters, within which one has the flexibility to put any letters, numbers, and combinations of underscores and periods.
I want to study how K-pop idols have made use of these restrictions to create their usernames, and from that, how the designs of their usernames might have affected their follower counts.
I will deduce the trends of what username characteristics are more likely to attract higher numbers of followers, and create a web app that lets one input usernames to receive a certain amount of followers according to my predictions.



library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(ggmisc)
